result.execSummary:
The defendant Fawn D. ENDRIES was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Under the Huber Law, concurrent with the sentences presently serving on 15 CF 101 and 15 CF 594.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Fawn D. ENDRIES

records.addlTxt: The Court denies the petition because at the time the sentence was imposed, the court did not order that the record be expunged upon successful completion of the sentence.

records.addlTxt:
The State files an Amended Information which charges one count of misdemeanor bail jumping, contrary to Section 946.49(1)(a) of the Wisconsin Statutes.  
GUILTY plea entered to the amended charge.  Convicted.
The defendant is sentenced to the Manitowoc County Jail for ten (10) days, under the Huber Law, concurrent with the sentences presently serving on 15 CF 101 and 15 CF 594.
The defendant has credit for 2 days.
The Court imposes the Court costs of $443.00.  $25.00 cash bail applied.  $418.00 balance is to be paid by
01-02-17 or 8 days county jail for failure to pay.
The Court orders defendant to submit to a DNA sample.
Minutes.
Plea date on May 20, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Plea date on April 27, 2016 at 11:15 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 6, 2016 at 11:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Fawn D. ENDRIES
Current: 1511 S. 35th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 03-23-2016)
Prior: 1016 S 18th Street #4, Manitowoc, WI 54220
Review on April 11, 2016 at 08:29 am.
Status conference at 03-22-2016 02:15 pm
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives her right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty pleas entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 01-15-16 at 10:30 a.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.
Anthony Lambrecht, Public Defender.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 11-10-15 at 1:30 p.m.   
Minutes.
$25.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody on warrant and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 11-02-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Court modifies bail to $25.00 cash with the condition defendant is to have no contact with Anissa Krall.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the County Jail.  Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail issued.  Copy filed.
Warrant returned with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.

Defendant failed to appear for initial appearance.   Bench warrant authorized.   
Minutes.
RE: bail jumping, on 07-28-15.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of bail jumping and hit and run-injury.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 09-14-15 at 9:30 a.m. Bail is set at $2,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that she have no contact with Anissa Krall.  Bail is furnished and the defendant is released from custody.  
Minutes.
